column4: hey, just a question...i know that the universe packages aren't updated. But, will they be updated between releases? For instance, amsn is at version 0.92 in universe right now and it wont be updated. but when hoary is released, will it be updated to say version 0.95 in the hoary tree?
it will be up to date with the version that is current on relese
or better on freeze... which is some weeks before
